text: [Music]
I'm Lonnie Johnson I'm an inventor the

reactors Air Force weapons laboratory on

Laboratory working on the Galileo

that was a high-performance water gun
you could really do
initially I learned to manufacture the

what I needed to have made it turned out
it was going to cost about two hundred
thousand dollars to get the first

it took about two weeks to build a gun

well does it work how well does it work

it took ten years from the idea to you
